item.label: SmbClient List Shared Folder On SERVER

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "iwconfig wlan0 essid [nome_rete] key [chiave-wep] mode managed"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "iwconfig wlan0 channel [channel] essid [essid] ap [MAC]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "route add default gateway [IP Gateway]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "hcitool info [mac adress dispositivo bluetooth]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "hcitool rssi [mac adress dispositivo bluetooth]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "hcitool lq [mac adress dispositivo bluetooth]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "john --single [--wordlist=FILE] --show --format=[DES | BSDI | MD5 | BF | AFS | LM | NT | mscash | NETLM | NETNTLM | bfegg | DOMINOSEC | lotus5 | raw-MD5 | raw-sha1 | IPB2 | nsldap | openssha | HDAA] [hash file]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "drcrack [rainbowntablesn | -d rainbowntables dictionary] [-h hash | -l hash_list | -f pwdump_file]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "drtgen -file [rtable name] -hash [hash type] -cLen [chain length] -cCount [chain n] -threads [n] -charset [byte-256c] -lmin -lmax"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "drtgen -file [rtable name] -hash [hash type] -cLen [chain length] -cCount [chain n] -threads [n] -d -dic [wordlist] -rules [mangling rule file]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "(proxychains) hydra [[[-l LOGIN|-L FILE] [-p PASS|-P FILE]] | [-C FILE]] [-e ns] [-o FILE] [-t TASKS] [-M FILE [-T TASKS]] [-w TIME] [-f] [-s PORT] [-S] [-vV] [-4|-6] [-x MIN:MAX:CHARSET] [server service [OPT]]|[service://server[:PORT][/pentest]]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "(proxychains) medusa -h [ip router] -U [username list] -P [password list] -e ns -f -M http -v 6"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "(proxychains) medusa [-h host|-H file] [-u username|-U file] [-p password|-P file] [-C file] -M module [OPT]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "python /pentest/unionfuzzer/uniofuzz.py -b [template.html] -m [number of files] -e [extension: html/php/aspx] -o [output folder: /var/www]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "python /pentest/unionfuzzer/uniofuzz.py -f -m [number of files] -e [extension: m3u/ini/pdf] -o [output folder: /home/user/files]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "python /pentest/unionfuzzer/uniofuzz.py -p -m [number of files] -i [interval: 1.5] -d [program to execute: '/bin/ls -n']"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "python /pentest/theHarvester-ng/theHarvester.py -d [Domain] -b [google | bing | bingapi | pgp | linkedin | google-profiles | exalead | all]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "(proxychains) nc -vv -n [IP Destinatario] [port/ports' range] [reverse >] [file input]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "(proxychains) nc -vv [target IP] [port] | HEAD / HTTP/1.0"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "netdiscover [-i device] [-r range | -p] [-s time] [-n node] [-c count] [-f (Fast)] [-S (HardCore)]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "dsniff [-cdmn] [-i interface | -p pcapfile] [-s snaplen] [-f services] [-t trigger[,...]] [-r|-w savefile] [expression]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "macof [-s src] [-d dst] [-e tha] [-x sport] [-y dport] [-i interface] [-n times]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "airodump-ng --bssid [mac address access bersaglio] -c [channel] -w [nome file cap] [interfaccia]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp --destination-port 80 -j REDIRECT --to-port 10000

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp --destination-port 443 -j REDIRECT --to-port 10000

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp --destination-port 20 -j REDIRECT --to-port 10000

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp --destination-port 21 -j REDIRECT --to-port 10000

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp --destination-port 22 -j REDIRECT --to-port 10000

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp --destination-port 990 -j REDIRECT --to-port 10000

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "airodump-ng --bssid [mac address access bersaglio] -c [channel] -w [nome file cap] [interfaccia]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "aireplay-ng 0 -1 -a [mac address access bersaglio] -h [your mac adress] [interfaccia]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "aireplay-ng -3 -a [mac address access bersaglio] -h [your mac adress] [interfaccia]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "aireplay-ng -4 -a [mac address access bersaglio] -h [your mac adress] [interfaccia]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "packetforge-ng 0 -a [mac address access bersaglio] -h [your mac adress] -k 255.255.255.255 -l 255.255.255.255 -y [file .xor] -w [nome file arp]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "aireplay-ng 0 -1 -a [mac address access point bersaglio] -c [mac adress victim] mon0"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "pyrit -e [nome essid] -i [percorso wordlist.txt] -r [percorso file .cap] attack_batch"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "pyrit -e [nome essid] -i [percorso wordlist.txt] -r [percorso file .cap] attack_db"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "pyrit -e [nome essid] -i [percorso wordlist.txt] -r [percorso file .cap] attack_cowpatty"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "pyrit -e [nome essid] -i [percorso wordlist.txt] -r [percorso file .cap] attack_passthrough"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "reaver -i monitorinterface -b apbssid [-c channel] [-e essid] -vv"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "python /pentest/wifite_r38.py -i [interface] -e [essid] -c [channel] --anon -pps [max packet/sec] --force-fake --autocrack [min ivs] -wepw [min(max attack time)] --no-wpa -p [min db]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "python /pentest/wifite_r38.py -i [interface] -e [essid] -c [channel] --anon -d [wordlist] -wpaw [min(time for handshake)] --no-strip --pyrit [pyrit/cowpatty attack] --no-wep -p [min db]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "crunch [min] [max] [charset] [-q [file to permute] | -t [@@@kk (@ change k constant)] ] -o [file output]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "cat [file.txt] | sed -e 's/[^a-zA-Z]/ /g' | tr '[:lower:]' '[:upper:]' | tr ' ' '\012' | sed -e '/^$/d' | sort -u >> [wordlist.txt]"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "cat * | sed -e 's/[^a-zA-Z]/ /g' | tr -cd '\11\12\40-\176' | tr ' ' '\012' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | sed -e '/aaa/d' | sed -e '/bbb/d' | sed -e '/ccc/d' | sed -e '/ddd/d' | sed -e '/eee/d' | sed -e '/fff/d' | sed -e '/ggg/d' | sed -e '/hhh/d' | sed -e '/iii/d' | sed -e '/jjj/d' | sed -e '/kkk/d' | sed -e '/lll/d' | sed -e '/mmm/d' | sed -e '/nnn/d' | sed -e '/ooo/d' | sed -e '/ppp/d' | sed -e '/qqq/d' | sed -e '/rrr/d' | sed -e '/sss/d' | sed -e '/ttt/d' | sed -e '/uuu/d' | sed -e '/vvv/d' | sed -e '/www/d' | sed -e '/xxx/d' | sed -e '/yyy/d' | sed -e '/zzz/d' | sed -e '/aa/d' | sed -e '/ee/d' | sed -e '/ii/d' | sed -e '/oo/d' | sed -e '/uu/d' | sed -e '/jj/d' | sed -e '/kk/d' | sed -e '/ww/d' | sed -e '/xx/d' | sed -e '/yy/d' | sed -e '/^$/d' | sort -u >> [wordlist.txt]

action.name: Execute
action.execute: roxterm -e echo "cat [input.txt] | sort -u [ --dictionary-order | --general-numeric-sort | --human-numeric-sort ] -f [min to maius] [--reverse] -T [temp dir] >> [output.txt]"

item.label: Delete parentesis and text included in them
